description:
Add user ids as nodes and fetch data.

Alternatively you can add the screen_name and switch the parameter "user_id" to "screen_name".

Adjust count-parameter and maximum pages to get more than 200 tweets. The API returns up to 3200 tweets.

See https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/timelines/api-reference/get-statuses-user_timeline for further information.
name: Get tweets of user
